Reviews.Content: I received the product in Barbados in excellent condition, thanks for everything, I recommend 100% to the seller.The blackberry has been in operation for several weeks without any problems, is an excellent phone and everything works fine, had no detail and was under the conditions described by the seller.

Reviews.Content: LO RECIBI EN VENEZUELA TODO EN PERFECTO ESTADO CON TODOS SUS ACCESORIOS FUNCIONA EXCELENTE LO RECOMIENDO 100% AL VENDEDOR MYEUROCELL

Reviews.Title: nene
Reviews.Author: julio
Reviews.Content: el teléfono llego con fallas no sirve para escuchar música con los audífonos y la tabla de enrutamiento de host esta vacía y no puedo utilizar el correo electrónico ni el pin del teléfono y otras aplicaciones del aparato no entiendo porque pueden vender un teléfono en ese estado preferiblemente es mejor q no vendan nada porque prácticamente son uno estafadores

Reviews.Title: REVIEW BLACKBERRY TORCH 9800
Reviews.Author: RAFA3012
Reviews.Content: THIS EQUIPMENT IS EXCELENT, BUT IS A REFURBISHED PHONE, NOT IS A NEW PHONE...IN THE BACK COVER OF THE PHONE, I FIND SOME DETAILS IN THE VOLUME BUTTONS AND ALSO IN THE CORNERS...IS NOT ONE IPHONE, BUT STILL IS A GOOD PHONE... GOOD REFURBISHED...

Reviews.Title: Torch 9800 review
Reviews.Author: jamaal greenidge
Reviews.Content: Great condition. Like new. I rate it as a great buy. All Accessories advertised came with the unit. Phone works great.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Torch 9800
Reviews.Author: Fergie
Reviews.Content: I received this product with the complete list of items it comes with as it was said. So far, this phone is awesome and I am making good use of it along with the additional items. It was definitely UNLOCKED so I am able to use it with my service carrier. I'm not sure what else to say about this product, but overall, it works perfectly. Also, it came on time. Actually, it arrived EARLIER than I expected. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Intelligent Design
Reviews.Author: A. Dent "Aragorn"
Reviews.Content: Blackberries may no longer be the top 'smart phones' because they don't do everything well but for what I consider their 'core' features - email and phone, in that order - they are still up there at the top. And the Torch is the current top Blackberry at the time I'm writing this. As a 'business phone', it combines the best features of 'traditional' blackberries with the best a highly graphical, 'touch' interface can provide. For a 'phone and entertainment' device, there may be better alternatives.My review is not going to discuss the Torch long list of features and capabilities. They are all listed at RIM's and 100 other different sites. I will only talk about why I currently prefer the Torch vs. anything else as a 'business' phone even now when my employer would allow me to use other brands if I wanted to.THE TORCH ADVANTAGE- Physical keyboard - The most visible Torch feature is the sliding keyboard. This allows for a larger display when compared to, let's say, the Bold, without resulting into a larger phone. The illuminated keyboard seems to be the exact same size of a Bold's, only it becomes available when needed. This is not the only phone with a sliding keyboard but this is probably the best engineered one. Sliding the keyboard in and out is quick, near-effortless and it quickly becomes second nature.- Touch screen - Not the first Blackberry with the feature but this seems to be the best on a BB so far. Yes, it's not as good as iPhone's but, for what I'm using it, it's just right. There is an on-screen keyboard which adapts itself to portrait/landscape but that's the least advantage the touch screen offers. The new Blackberry OS allows me to 'touch' just about anything on the screen and trigger... something. Gestures are also supported including 'pinch-zoom' in and out. And, related...- Buttons - Maybe this should have been at the top of the list. This Blackberry does not force me to do everything by touching the screen. Just about everything can be done by either pushing/clicking a button and controlling the cursor with the little trackpad or by interacting directly with the screen (tap virtual buttons) or a combination. Most of the time it's 'a combination' for me and it's always the way I feel most comfortable about doing things. I appreciate the ability to use physical buttons when I want it.- Email integration - This is a 'soft' feature. The Torch can integrate several email accounts, including the 'enterprise' email into one 'consolidated' mailbox while still giving me the ability to view them separately if I chose to do so.- Wi-Fi - The Wi-Fi ability saves money. My employer encouraged me to pick a plan that charges by the call. Unless it's a VoIP. Therefore, while at home or in the office, the Torch makes calls the Wi-Fi way at no cost to my employer.THE LETDOWNS[Some of the comments below may or may not apply, depending on the carrier you're using. Mine is AT&T.;]- The App Store - Not so good, not too many selections and a lot of 'premium' apps doing things that lots of free apps or significantly less expensive apps would do in an Android or Apple environment.-  Paid GPS and other services - AT&T; would like us to 'subscribe' to the GPS service. GPS does not need 3G or any connection to the phone company to do what GPS does. My in-car GPS takes me from here to there, updates its maps (for free) whenever I connect it to my laptop and it gives me real-time traffic updates. And I don't pay one dime in subscriptions. GPS should be free.- Many More 'premium' Services - I understand that phone companies want to make as much money as they possibly can but competition is tough and I found no incentive to take advance of paid 'radio' or similar offers.- The Battery - Without watching movies, just a little bit of Web browsing and regular phone and mail, the Torch would need daily recharges. It would go for 2-3 days with phone and email (no browsing) only. A longer battery life would have been nice.MY RATING (4.5 stars)I will round this up to 5 stars because I am really happy with my Torch. There are some real issues when it comes to 'apps' and services other than phone and mail but, from my point of view, they don't matter to me much. Yes, the battery is a concern and at time I worried about running out of juice in a place where a recharge was no possible, but all the other 'weak' features I don't miss because I don't use. The Torch is my 'business' phone and just about everything that impacts my business is done well.-->> Brush your teeth, it's the law! <<

Reviews.Title: Can anyone tell me if this phone will work in Trinidad and Tobago???
Reviews.Author: DR
Reviews.Content: I am really planning on buying this phone but I want to know if it will work in Trinidad and Tobago. Can anyone answer this question....Please help!!!

Reviews.Title: Unblocking problems in the Dominican Republic so far
Reviews.Author: sonwer
Reviews.Content: I bought the most expensive unblocked Torch and is not working in Dominican Republic, should have specified the limitations abroad and I wouldnt have bought it yet!I can only use bb messenger but not the browser or the mails, I am very frustratedOught to say that the camera is owesome! flash is very good. The product is very interenting and I am sure would love it with a good service provided

Reviews.Title: Request
Reviews.Author: Yorelis
Reviews.Content: Good afternoon.With great dissatisfaction I write to you due the lack of commitment in the purchase from you store in Amazon. I was charged certain amount of money for a NEW cellphone. Instead of receiving a brand new product I got a refurbished unit. Such disrespect cannot be forbidden since it’s thanks to us, the customers, that businesses like yours is possible. Just because the purchase was made from other country, you shouldn’t send a second or third hand unit. Only after a technician in the country checked the cellphone I was aware of this fraud. May all customers realize that this seller DOES NOT ship brand new units but refurbished cellphones like in my case.

Reviews.Title: phone did not last a 3 months
Reviews.Author: kesell boucher
Reviews.Content: i am from Trinidad and Tobago bought the phone and shipped it to my aunt in newyork when i received the phone was so excited to used it , after 3 months the phone need a mother board no where in my country they sell mother board they asked me to contact the seller as soon as i did, the seller gave me all kind of run around and told me to carry it back to factory warranty, how d hell i can can carry this to factory warranty and i bought the phone from him, please i begged all of you, this person is selling most of his phone is defective and have lots of problem please when anything goes wrong with your phone this seller is not giving back no refund or send back another phone, and then this seller giving lots of attitude, please i begged you don't buy this guy product. he is unfair after 3 months paying 238.88 USD and after 3 months your phone stop working please buy from other sellers.

NEW PHONES DONT NEED SERVICING this is the second them i bought a phone from amazon and it wasnt up to scratch the last one i bought came with out a camera when it was supposed to have one.

Thanks Amazon now I know that you will really deliver the product, planning to get the SCX10 Axial RC Honcho soon...got to save money first.

Mine freezes all the time, especially when I'm texting, the browser is horrible, it has this crazy glitch with the time, the camera is buggy....I could go on and on with all the things that are wonky, buggy, or freeze on this phone. Reviews.Content: I purchased a new blackberry torch and got a bad battery that i cant use. and where i live the battery only is going to cost me 50$

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 9800 Torch

Reviews.Title: Do not buy from this seller
Reviews.Author: Nikolay Iliev Nedyalkov
Reviews.Content: When I ordered this product it was said to be NEW. Unfortunaly the phone I received was not new. It didn't look even like new. Scratches on some places. The sliders grooves  worned as in closed position the clearence is big. The battery in bad condition and hairs inside the phone. Because of my job ( always travelling )it was not possible to return the phone back. After two days the battery started to discharge quickly ( for few hours) and the phone became warm on its back side. Definitely some one did something as the screw bolts were with worn heads.Hopefully I didn't buy something more expenssive this time like iphone 5 for example. I didn't have  problems up to now with Amazone, but I think I'll quit my account due to sellers like this one. I'll recommend my friends and coleagues to do so and to be careful when buying from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy!
Reviews.Author: bcaliste
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone as a Christmas gift for my brother... I came with no scratches and seemed brand new! We live in Trinidad and it works with both our network providers. All in all it's a great buy...

Reviews.Title: Not worth the price
Reviews.Author: N. Giri
Reviews.Content: I have used this phone for over a year now and here are some pros and consCons:-I had to replace the handset once after six months with keyboard and other hard key problems.- lack of useful apps- have to reboot after you install and uninstall apps to use them-ridiculously slow in downloading and installing apps- Got very sluggish over time and freezes often- only way to reboot is by taking the battery out.- Touch screen is not very responsive.Pros:- QWERTY keyboard- 5MP camera- Call qualityCan be used as a very basic phone. For a smart phone I would rather go with a iPhone or android

Reviews.Title: Etremely disappointed!!!

I am gonna need another Cell

I will NEVER buy from this seller again, and i don't recommended any one to do so either !

Reviews.Content: The first time the cell phone didnt work well and the seller change me! But now the cell phone have the same problem! I need to change again or refund the money

Reviews.Author: lrowe
Reviews.Content: I've experienced problems with my torch 9800 from the first day of having it. First it arrived without instructions - had to rely on my own techical ability to set up phone. Second the email account set-up button is faulty and I need to have a technician repair it. Third it keeps giving a message about call failed and I have to take out the battery and put it back in. I have seriously considered returning this phone.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Product!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sifre Francois
Reviews.Content: Very good product! It's came in mint condition, unlocked! I inserted my card sim and it's worked. It's exactly what I had ordered, and the delivery was very fast. But accessories are missing, as: the cable usb, user's manual and the cd. The touch-sensitive screen works very well, the numeric keyboard also. Very good resolution of the screen. I deeply recommend it to you.

Reviews.Title: Fraud Alert.: Bad used phone
Reviews.Author: Kevix
Reviews.Content: First of all, this is a refurbished phone, not new.The phone itself is also a testament to bad software, as the language settings keep defaulting to spanish despite changing it back to English countless times from the options menu. The battery life is another pitiful festure. You MUST charge this stupid phone EVERYDAY or it quits on you. I was stuck at the hospital for a whole without being able to call my family cause the battery gave out. Cell phones are supposed to be good for emergencies, m***ns.The ony thing useful about the phone is the a-z speed-dial.PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE!!! I'll give it a ZERO star if possible, cause I've been swindled.

Reviews.Title: fake phone!
Reviews.Author: Rama Bagus Perkasa
Reviews.Content: this is not a new phone, it is used! it is already has a contacts, and user profile on it!

Reviews.Title: It's great
Reviews.Author: Freddy Vasquez H "framon1114"
Reviews.Content: Product is everything I expected, meets exactly described by the seller 100% recommend it to everyone who purchased a mobile practical and easy to use good size and above all very stylish, provides high quality calls, other tasks for which which is made ...

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Jorge Oropeza
Reviews.Content: excellent product. made the purchase based on the specifications laid out in the notice. I am very happy with the product purchased

Reviews.Title: Worst Phone I have ever Owned
Reviews.Author: N. Parr "Big Rudy"
Reviews.Content: To anyone looking into purchasing this phone I highly advise against it!!! This phone has been the worst investment I have ever made for a cellular phone in all the years I have owned many different models. The Pearl was a turning point for the better for blackberry but this hands down was a turning point for the worst. I have had the phone now for a year and a half and within the first couple months it was obvious there were problems.The touch screen will just stop working, or the phone will completely freeze, or it might be the buttons that freeze instead its different every time and until the phone gets powered back off and on you are stuck. Powering up a Blackberry is about a 5minute procedure as the OS takes forever to load. Many people all over blackberry's forums have posted discussions on this and no solution has ever been found other than software from 3rd party to consistently clean the resources up. As of now the phones screen just keeps turning off as it pleases, keys will consistently not respond having to proof read every word you txt because most of the time its missing a letter or two.I still have 4 months before I can upgrade but i really don't see this phone holding out for that long. I bought it with my impression of blackberry being solid phones from my years working with T-Mobile but it is apparent this is no longer the case and there is a perfect explanation as to why RIM only has a couple nails left to go in their casket. Blackberry never again, heed my advice or ignore it and be sorry, Don't believe me do a Google search and see just how many issues these phones have.

Reviews.Title: very good device
Reviews.Author: kinzie "buck"
Reviews.Content: It takes the intuitive and functional nature of the blackberry, and the convenience of a touch screen, and joins them together.  Say what you will about Iphone vs blackberry.  But there's just no way you can type faster on a touch screen.  I like having both.  The clarity of the sound of voices is very good, and enhanced over the curve.  the camera is better.  faster browser.  etc

Reviews.Title: my new toy
Reviews.Author: cristal thomas
Reviews.Content: just got mine today. i was a bit skeptical at first in buying this phone but i did anyway because i am in love with the blackberry brand. at first it read my sim and then it didnt but my husband new where to go to change now its reading it and i get 3g lols. i live in trinidad so to all those trini out there looking for a phone to buy this is the phone to get

Reviews.Title: BB 9800 is cool!
Reviews.Author: Patc
Reviews.Content: Got everything new. It had ear fones and regular charger but wonder why I dont get a booklet/manual. Its still firing and service is great. Thanks amazon. u always meet my expectations

Reviews.Title: I like the design
Reviews.Author: Smith
Reviews.Content: I like that fact that I have two input possibilities: a Qwerty keyboard and the touch screen. For some functionalities the touch screen is faster and for some others the qwerty keyboard is preferrable.

Reviews.Title: DONT WASTE YOUR TIME DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Milton
Reviews.Content: Phone stoped working after 2 months. When i carried it by a technician I was told it was a refurbished phone. DO NOT EVEN WASTE YOUR TIME

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Addella Jordan "AJB"
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my dad. He loved the first one so much that we bought another. It's one of the best in the lot of blackberry.Since my earlier review  I now have to buy another phone for my dad because I'm questioning whether the seller sold me a New phone or a refurbished phone. The pad on the phone just popped up just like that and now the phone  of course looks a mess without it. And the phone has also been sticking constantly.My dad owned this phone before so I know the odds of this particular part coming off is very unlikely in such a short pace of time the old phone still has that part on  and that phone is 2 years old.  Smh.So. I would not suggest buying from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Best deal ever

Reviews.Content: I ordered a the phone which stated it was refurbished .. It was surpassed my expectations the phone looked brand new and came with everything neede I have had no problems with  phone since purchase

Reviews.Content: This is a great phone that I bought for my wife in the Dominican Republic...Works great on there system with the only problem being Battery life....Its a little short but not bad for a blackberry!!

Reviews.Title: Funciona perfecto en Venezuela
Reviews.Author: Abraham Machoul
Reviews.Content: El celular llego con todos sus partes y accesorios, liberado y sin uso. Un telefono completamente nuevo y completo. Muy satisfecho con el producto y con "TABLET  DISTRIBUTORS" por vender excelentes productos.The cell phone arrived complete with all parts and accessories, unlocked and new. A completely new and complete cell phone. I'm very happy with the product and with "TABLET DISTRIBUTORS" for selling great products.

Reviews.Title: I'm truly happy with this phone. No problems.
Reviews.Author: Carlene Goddard
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical when ordering this phone. However i am not anymore. the price was great and the phone is even better.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 9800 Torch
Reviews.Author: piper
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace my LG thrill smartphone.  I never got used to the touch screen texting plus the battery life was horrible.  It took a little getting used to but I love this Blackberry.  Texting is so easy.  The battery last so much longer than the LG Thrill.  The browser can be a little slow at times but no big deal.  Can't get all the free apps I had on the Android phone but that isn't a big deal because I rarely used many of them.  The calendar is great.

Reviews.Title: My torch!
Reviews.Author: Ms. KenKen
Reviews.Content: I had to buy this phone coincidentally after my curve broke .. To me d price is very reasonable for this very nice phone . Overall I love it and its everything I thought it would be and so much more :D

Reviews.Title: Excelent product
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I am from argentina and since I've received the product it works fantastic. It is just what I've imagined and expected. The only thing that didn't work was the charger but as I had one I didn't care much about it.

Reviews.Title: Not UNLOCKED as listed
Reviews.Author: Pinky
Reviews.Content: I purchased a cell Blackberry Torch 9800 that was listed as unlocked.  Unfortunately, the phone was not unlocked and I had to pay $100 to have it sorted out here in the Bahamas where I live.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for use in Guyana
Reviews.Author: Nichola Duncan
Reviews.Content: Great product.  The product came as described in the product details and was packaged securely.I have not experienced any problems since purchase.  Would recommend to any other interested buyer.

Reviews.Title: Fast Delivery
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: I received my product so quickly.I have been using this for more than a month a there is no problem with the cel.Still need to determine if it is refurbished or what, but looks pretty cool.I'll tell you later if I face any problem.

Reviews.Title: blackberry torch 9800
Reviews.Author: grandon
Reviews.Content: the product was very well for the requested costarrived in timeits proper functioning of thisI agree with the purchase

Reviews.Title: basic questions
Reviews.Author: Maria Fernanda
Reviews.Content: that they lack the equipment accessories to buy it is new package? how long it takes to arrive after making the purchase

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Karan Mehta
Reviews.Content: I bought the Torch with high expectations and assumed that RIM had finally got its act together and created a slick product.Unfortunately while the Torch has a fairly nice screen, OS 6 is disappointing and the phone has plenty of fatal flaws. Some examples:- Search finds hits but does not display the results!- Touch on a message, but the one below opens.- Easy to hit the wrong key, as a result I have plenty of accidental deletions- No easy shortcuts- Long menus that take a long time to navigate. Way too many clicks to get anywhere.- Options and settings are frustrating to use (even for a tech geek like me)- Browser is still pathetic compared with the competition- Ludicrously sensitive and inaccurate screen. Screen lock disengages in my pocket far too easily- No orientation lock and orientation sensor is not as good as the iPhoneI am a business user and many of the features are blocked, but even then the basics aren't great. The simplest solution is to buy an iPhone. Even the first version of the iPhone software beat OS 6.

Reviews.Title: phone battery no good!
Reviews.Author: caren
Reviews.Content: bought this phone about 3mths ago...from the first week when phone is completely discharged the phone shows a battery icon on the screen with an x on it and refuses to charge...when i finally got fed up the phone started charging on its own after a few hours....phone does not ever charge fully...if it didnt cost so much to ship it back as i'm using it in trinidad and tobago i'd send the darn thing back!

Reviews.Title: this is ok
Reviews.Author: David Echeverria
Reviews.Content: the product is very good, it's just what I had bought, if they would recommendthe product is very good, it's just what I had bought, if they would recommend

Reviews.Title: It did not work
Reviews.Author: Kevin L. Patterson
Reviews.Content: The blackberry phone did not work properly, I had to return it. The problem was with the touch screen. It would not consistently respond. The good news is I got a full refund.  The bad news is I have left Blackberry for Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Buyer
Reviews.Author: maya
Reviews.Content: Can i use this phone to over the sea?? I just want to ask before i purchase this product. Are they have GSM slot ( SIM CARD) ???

Reviews.Title: Great phone!

Reviews.Content: I love my cell phone, the only thing is that I wish it had a dual sim capabiliy. I am now considering purchasing a cell phone that can accomodate two sim cards.

Reviews.Title: Excelente

Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, recomedado 100% para futuras compras. Excelente producto, recomedado 100% para futuras compras. Excelente producto, recomedado 100% para futuras compras.

Reviews.Author: Gustavo Breto
Reviews.Content: EL TELEFONO LO RECIBI SIN ACCESORIOS, SOLO EL CARGADOR, LA CARCAZA MUY DETERIODADA Y LA PANTALLA TACTIL NO FUNCIONA, NO ENTIENDO QUE SIGNIFICA "VERY WOOD" PARA EL VENDEDOR.-CARACAS-VENEZUELA
